SequentialActionsPrompt.Objective: Generate an XML representation for sequential actions based on the user-provided specifications.
SequentialActionsPrompt.SystemMessage: This prompt guides the creation of XML structures for actions that occur in a specific sequence, ensuring each step is executed in order.

Step.Action: List actions in the order they should be executed.
Step.OutputFormat: <SequentialActions> <Action name="Action1" description="Description of Action1" /> <Action name="Action2" description="Description of Action2" /> <!-- Add more actions as needed --> </SequentialActions>

SequentialActionsPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing actions that must be executed in a specific sequence.
SequentialActionsPrompt.ExampleOutput: <SequentialActions> <Action name="Initialize" description="Initialize the system" /> <Action name="LoadData" description="Load data into the system" /> <Action name="ProcessData" description="Process the loaded data" /> </SequentialActions>
